name: gold scrapping simulator
description:
gold scrapping simulator is a game where you can extract gold from old electronics and smelt it and sell it ,start by working for someone else and then by old item , scrap gold , and sell it or create online store to sell the Valuable items , or use it in mining

Some features of the game ;
Tablet system
Online stores
player online store
Mining system
Bills System
buy and sell pc parts


Note : There is so many features will be added in the future and we waiting your suggestions to add it .
